alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 4:41PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Surging outflow from a cluster of a strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pueblo County through 515 PM MDT... At 438 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking surging outflow from a cluster of strong thunderstorms which will impact portions of northeastern Pueblo County, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Pueblo and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Strongest outflow winds may occur away from any precipitation or lightning.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
